CustomField.formula: IF ( OR( ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "Request"), ISPICKVAL(Apttus__Status_Category__c, "In Authoring") ), HYPERLINK("/apex/Apttus__OfflineDocumentImport?id="&Id+"&finishPage=APT_ImportLegacyDocument", IMAGE("/resource/APT_ImportLegacyDocument", "Import Legacy Document"),"_self"), NULL)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Import BPA related documents, or other legacy documents using this button
CustomField.label: Import Legacy Document
